intro.description: In a few steps, this cheat sheet will guide you through the import of a TestSpecification.

item.title: Open menu
item.description: First, go with the mouse cursor in the "GlobalTester Navigator" window. Right-click, and choose "Import".

item.title: Select TestSpecification
item.description: In the tree view, select "GlobalTester > Import TestSpecification from Plugin". Click the "Next" button.

item.title: Choose a Project Name
item.description: In the text field "Projectname", choose a name for your project, for example "GlobalTester Sample TestSpecification". In the list, choose the TestSpecification "GlobalTester Sample TestSpecification". Have a look at the description of it that is given in the field below to get a quick overview of the purpose of the TestSpecification. Then click "Finish".
item.onCompletion: Congratulations! You have just learned how to import a TestSpecification!
